subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Scott Verplank spoiled a bogey-free round with a shot that found water on the final hole Thursday, but his six-under-par 66 was still good enough for a share of the lead at the Bob Hope Chrysler Classic.
snippet: Scott Verplank spoiled a bogey-free round with a shot that found water on the final hole Thursday, but his six-under-par 66 was still good enough for a share of the lead at the Bob Hope Chrysler Classic.
